languages.text: Обслуживающий клан генераторов пустотных щитов попросил {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость Лорд-капитана о помощи. По отсекам расползлась скверна в обличье грибницы. Мицелий захватывал новые пространства, а жирные черные споры отравляли слуг Вольного Торговца, заставляя их глаза лопаться, а вены — раздуваться и разрывать кожные покровы. Клану были выданы укрепленные униробы с противогазами, чтобы они могли продолжать работать, пока воины выжигают заразу.

traits.locale_text: Обслуживающий клан генераторов пустотных щитов попросил Его Светлость Лорд-капитана о помощи. По отсекам расползлась скверна в обличье грибницы. Мицелий захватывал новые пространства, а жирные черные споры отравляли слуг Вольного Торговца, заставляя их глаза лопаться, а вены — раздуваться и разрывать кожные покровы. Клану были выданы укрепленные униробы с противогазами, чтобы они могли продолжать работать, пока воины выжигают заразу.

languages.text: The clan servicing the void shield arrays petitioned the Lord Captain for aid. Compartments were becoming overrun with putrescent fungal corruption. The mycelium claimed one chamber after another. The thick black spores poisoned the Rogue Trader's servants, causing their eyes to burst and their veins to swell until their skin ruptured. The clan was issued reinforced unirobes and gas masks so they could keep working while the soldiers burned away the infestation.
languages.original_text: Обслуживающий клан генераторов пустотных щитов попросил {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость Лорд-капитана о помощи. По отсекам расползлась скверна в обличье грибницы. Мицелий захватывал новые пространства, а жирные черные споры отравляли слуг Вольного Торговца, заставляя их глаза лопаться, а вены — раздуваться и разрывать кожные покровы. Клану были выданы укрепленные униробы с противогазами, чтобы они могли продолжать работать, пока воины выжигают заразу.

traits.locale_text: The clan servicing the void shield arrays petitioned Lord Captain for aid. Compartments were overrun with putrescent fungal corruption. The mycelium claimed one chamber after another and the thick black spores poisoned the Rogue Trader's servants, causing their eyes to burst and their veins to swell until they ruptured the skin. The clan was issued reinforced unirobes and gas masks so they could keep working while the soldiers burn out the infestation.

The clan was issued reinforced unirobes and gas masks so they could keep working while the soldiers burned away the infestation.

The thick black spores poisoned the Rogue Trader's servants, causing their eyes to burst and their veins to swell until their skin ruptured. The clan was issued reinforced unirobes and gas masks so they could keep working while the soldiers burned away the infestation.

The clan servicing the void shield arrays petitioned the Lord Captain for aid. Compartments were becoming overrun with putrescent fungal corruption. The mycelium claimed one chamber after another. The thick black spores poisoned the Rogue Trader's servants, causing their eyes to burst and their veins to swell until their skin ruptured. The clan was issued reinforced unirobes and gas masks so they could keep working while the soldiers burned away the infestation.

languages.text: 负责虚空盾阵的氏族向领主舰长请求援助。他们的船舱到处充斥着腐烂的真菌，菌丝占据了一个又一个房间，厚厚的黑色孢子不断毒害着行商浪人的仆人。被孢子感染的人眼球爆开，血管在皮下膨胀，直至浑身皮肤破裂。这个氏族随后得到了强化过的罩袍与防毒面具，这样他们就可以在士兵们忙于扑灭瘟疫时继续工作。
languages.original_text: The clan servicing the void shield arrays petitioned the Lord Captain for aid. Compartments were becoming overrun with putrescent fungal corruption. The mycelium claimed one chamber after another. The thick black spores poisoned the Rogue Trader's servants, causing their eyes to burst and their veins to swell until their skin ruptured. The clan was issued reinforced unirobes and gas masks so they could keep working while the soldiers burned away the infestation.

traits.locale_text: 负责虚空盾阵的氏族向领主舰长请求援助。他们的船舱到处充斥着腐烂的真菌，菌丝占据了一个又一个房间，厚厚的黑色孢子不断毒害着行商浪人的仆人。被孢子感染的人眼球爆开，血管在皮下膨胀，直至浑身皮肤破裂。这个氏族随后得到了强化过的罩袍与防毒面具，这样他们就可以在士兵们忙于扑灭瘟疫时继续工作。

languages.text: El clan que se ocupa de los escudos del vacío pidió ayuda {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán. Los compartimentos estaban siendo invadidos por la corrupción fúngica putrescente. El micelio se apoderaba de una cámara tras otra. Las espesas esporas negras envenenaban a los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, haciéndoles estallar los ojos e hinchándoles las venas hasta que se les rompía la piel. El clan recibió unitúnicas reforzadas y máscaras de gas para que pudieran seguir trabajando mientras los soldados quemaban la infestación.
languages.original_text: The clan servicing the void shield arrays petitioned the Lord Captain for aid. Compartments were becoming overrun with putrescent fungal corruption. The mycelium claimed one chamber after another. The thick black spores poisoned the Rogue Trader's servants, causing their eyes to burst and their veins to swell until their skin ruptured. The clan was issued reinforced unirobes and gas masks so they could keep working while the soldiers burned away the infestation.

traits.locale_text: El clan que se ocupa de los escudos del vacío pidió ayuda {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán. Los compartimentos estaban siendo invadidos por la corrupción fúngica putrescente. El micelio se apoderaba de una cámara tras otra. Las espesas esporas negras envenenaban a los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, haciéndoles estallar los ojos e hinchándoles las venas hasta que se les rompía la piel. El clan recibió unitúnicas reforzadas y máscaras de gas para que pudieran seguir trabajando mientras los soldados quemaban la infestación.

languages.text: ヴォイドシールドのアレイを管理する一族が、ロード・キャプテンに救いの手を求めた。区画がドロドロの菌の腐敗であふれている。菌は次々に部屋を侵食していく。肉厚の黒い胞子が自由開拓者の従者を腐敗させて、彼らの目は破裂し、血管が膨らんで皮膚を突き破った。一族には強化されたユニローブとガスマスクが支給されたので、兵士が侵入生物を燃やしている間も、彼らは作業を続けることができた。
languages.original_text: The clan servicing the void shield arrays petitioned the Lord Captain for aid. Compartments were becoming overrun with putrescent fungal corruption. The mycelium claimed one chamber after another. The thick black spores poisoned the Rogue Trader's servants, causing their eyes to burst and their veins to swell until their skin ruptured. The clan was issued reinforced unirobes and gas masks so they could keep working while the soldiers burned away the infestation.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシールドのアレイを管理する一族が、ロード・キャプテンに救いの手を求めた。区画がドロドロの菌の腐敗であふれている。菌は次々に部屋を侵食していく。肉厚の黒い胞子が自由開拓者の従者を腐敗させて、彼らの目は破裂し、血管が膨らんで皮膚を突き破った。一族には強化されたユニローブとガスマスクが支給されたので、兵士が侵入生物を燃やしている間も、彼らは作業を続けることができた。

languages.text: Les clans chargés de l'entretien des boucliers Void demandent l'aide {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Les compartiments sont envahis par une corruption fongique putrescente, le mycélium infiltrant les salles les unes après les autres. Les épaisses spores noires empoisonnent les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, faisant éclater leurs globes oculaires et gonfler leurs veines jusqu'à ce qu'elles se rompent. Des unirobes renforcées et des masques à gaz sont distribués au clan afin que le travail puisse se poursuivre pendant que les soldats se chargent de l'infestation.
languages.original_text: The clan servicing the void shield arrays petitioned the Lord Captain for aid. Compartments were becoming overrun with putrescent fungal corruption. The mycelium claimed one chamber after another. The thick black spores poisoned the Rogue Trader's servants, causing their eyes to burst and their veins to swell until their skin ruptured. The clan was issued reinforced unirobes and gas masks so they could keep working while the soldiers burned away the infestation.

traits.locale_text: Les clans chargés de l'entretien des boucliers Void demandent l'aide {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Les compartiments sont envahis par une corruption fongique putrescente, le mycélium infiltrant les salles les unes après les autres. Les épaisses spores noires empoisonnent les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, faisant éclater leurs globes oculaires et gonfler leurs veines jusqu'à ce qu'elles se rompent. Des unirobes renforcées et des masques à gaz sont distribués au clan afin que le travail puisse se poursuivre pendant que les soldats se chargent de l'infestation.

languages.text: Der Clan, der die Deflektorschilde betreut, hat den Lord Captain um Hilfe gebeten. Ein verwesender Pilz hat ihre Räume befallen. Das Mycelium eroberte eine Kammer nach der anderen. Die dicken schwarzen Sporen haben die Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} schwer vergiftet, und ihre Venen anschwellen lassen, bis die Haut und die Augen platzen. Der Clan wurde mit verstärkten Uniroben und Gasmasken ausgestattet, damit er weiterarbeiten konnte, während die Soldaten den Befall durch Feuer entfernt haben.
languages.original_text: The clan servicing the void shield arrays petitioned the Lord Captain for aid. Compartments were becoming overrun with putrescent fungal corruption. The mycelium claimed one chamber after another. The thick black spores poisoned the Rogue Trader's servants, causing their eyes to burst and their veins to swell until their skin ruptured. The clan was issued reinforced unirobes and gas masks so they could keep working while the soldiers burned away the infestation.

traits.locale_text: Der Clan, der die Deflektorschilde betreut, hat den Lord Captain um Hilfe gebeten. Ein verwesender Pilz hat ihre Räume befallen. Das Mycelium eroberte eine Kammer nach der anderen. Die dicken schwarzen Sporen haben die Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} schwer vergiftet, und ihre Venen anschwellen lassen, bis die Haut und die Augen platzen. languages.text: Uçsuz kalkan dizilimlerinden sorumlu klan, Lord Kaptan'dan yardım talep etti. Kompartımanlar, çürümüş mantar yozlaşmasının istilası altında kaldı. Mantar, odaları art arda ele geçirdi. Kalın siyah sporlar, Hür Tacir'in hizmetkârlarını zehirleyip gözlerinin patlamasına, damarlarının şişmesine ve derilerinin yırtılmasına neden oldu. Klan mensuplarına güçlendirilmiş koruyucu kıyafetler ve gaz maskeleri dağıtılması sayesinde askerler istilaya karşı mücadele ederken onlar da çalışmayı sürdürebildi.
languages.original_text: The clan servicing the void shield arrays petitioned the Lord Captain for aid. Compartments were becoming overrun with putrescent fungal corruption. The mycelium claimed one chamber after another. The thick black spores poisoned the Rogue Trader's servants, causing their eyes to burst and their veins to swell until their skin ruptured. The clan was issued reinforced unirobes and gas masks so they could keep working while the soldiers burned away the infestation.
